QuestData.Title: Need to Know
QuestData.Description: I need to know what New Hearthglen is up to.$B$BI want you to steal their orders of the day so that I can find that out.$B$BHead south and in their abbey, in their barracks, and on their beach, find those daily plans!$B$BJust in case you're confused, the barracks is the large building right next to the smithy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Spy Mistress Repine at Venomspite has asked you to steal the Scarlet Onslaught Daily Orders: Abbey, Scarlet Onslaught Daily Orders: Barracks, and Scarlet Onslaught Daily Orders: Beach.
QuestData.CompletionText: If you take too long, their daily plans will change, and we may have to start over again.$B$BDon't take too long!
QuestData.RewardText: Well, what are you waiting for, $r? Hand them over!
